description: These easy chickpea salad sandwiches are made with smoky avocado dressing, crunchy cucumbers and red bell peppers, all piled between crusty bread slices. Perfect for a healthy lunch or light dinner!
keywords: healthy lunch, vegan lunch, vegan sandwich
name: Smoky Smashed Chickpea Salad Sandwiches
recipeIngredient: 1 3/4 cups cooked or 1 can chickpeas, (rinsed and drained)
A few handfuls of arugula or lettuce

recipeInstructions.text: Place the avocado and lemon into medium mixing bowl. I like to it beat with a whisk or fork to get avocado as smooth as possible, but you can skip that if you're into chunky.
Add the vinegar, smoke and salt. Mix well. Taste-test and adjust the seasonings as needed.
Add the chickpeas and roughly mash them. I like to leave about half of them in-tact, but mash up as much as you like.
Add the cucumber, pepper, scallions and cilantro. Mix to blend everything.
Distribute mixture among three or four sandwiches, topping each with arugula or lettuce.
